data.title: Cheviot News, Weather, Safety, Sports
data.meta_description: NewsBreak provides latest and breaking Cheviot, OH local news, weather forecast, crime and safety reports, traffic updates, event notices, sports, entertainment, local life and other items of interest in the community and nearby towns.
data.text:
CINCINNATI — At least two people have been injured in a shooting in Colerain Township. WLWT's cameras saw police investigating outside of a sports bar on Pippin Road. Dispatch says officers were called there for a reported shooting just before 2:30 a.m. Sunday. Police on scene tell us a...

Cincinnati, OH – Below-average temperatures are expected to persist across the Ohio Valley this Sunday, with the National Weather Service (NWS) in Wilmington, Ohio, predicting a high of 80°F in Cincinnati. Most of the region will see daytime highs in the mid-70s, including areas like Dayton and Wilmington, where highs are projected to be around 75°F. These cooler-than-average temperatures come as a relief after a stretch of warmer days.

METAIRIE, La. — Artur Rubim and Gustavo Oliveira scored second-half goals Saturday to help Xavier University of Louisiana earn a 2-1 exhibition men’s soccer victory against LSU-Eunice at Lafreniere Park. It was the first of three Gold Rush exhibitions in six-days against two-year schools. XULA will visit Jones...

In his first game action since suffering a season-ending wrist injury last season, Cincinnati quarterback Joe Burrow didn't get hit during Saturday's preseason opener, a 17-14 loss to the Buccaneers in which he led a first-quarter scoring drive.

In the spring, the goal was simple: give kids a place to go on Saturday nights in the summer. There were very few places where kids could just hang out.

Grooming is not illegal in Ohio, even though experts say most child sex abuse cases start with it. Saturday was a brief taste of home for the University of Cincinnati Bearcats football team after a week in the woods at the Higher Ground Retreat and Conference Center in West Harrison, Indiana. The Reds may be on the outside looking in come the playoffs, but Jonathan India has given them reason to be happy about the future.

CINCINNATI (WXIX) - Saturday was a pleasant day! CVG recorded an official high temperature of 78° after a crisp morning low of 57°. The forecast over the next couple of days will be ideal to give your air conditioner a break and open the windows in the mornings and evenings (unless you’re okay with your home cooling in the 50s)!
